name: TED
description:
This is a game I'm developing for my sons - they're both under 5 and are starting to get into games. I wanted to create a simple puzzle game which was impossible to lose (no puzzle is impossible nor can you get into an unwinnable situation), had no enemies which required timing or dexterity to avoid / beat (they have none!!!), and starred as main characters - their bedtime teddies!

There are 15 levels and your goal is to help the Green Teddy find his pal Red Teddy, navigating the house, baby gates, collecting candy, and re-uniting them!

It's pretty simple and harmless, has a very young audience in mind, and has been a blast to develop alongside my kids. Hope you enjoy too.
